body.p: I have written to the Govr to-day informing him of the murder of Dr Norwood & requesting him to offer a reward. &c. I wish you would see him as soon as you recieve this & try to induce him to offer as large a reward as he things consistent with circumstances and his duty & then inform me. I desire this, because if the reward is large and specified (which is not accurately done in the hand bill enclosed) many persons on this & the other side of the river will be induced to search for himthe ^murderer^
No news, Remember me to com'r Kitty & believe me
